name: eamd.ucp
description: Enterprise Application Management Descriptors for Unit Component Package Standard

scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist && lerna clean --yes && lerna run clean
scripts.init: npm-run-all clean load:components lerna:bootstrap lerna:build copy:dist
scripts.build:modules: npm run lerna:bootstrap && npm run lerna:build &&  npm run copy:dist
scripts.build:once: rimraf src/submodules/com/github/ucpComponents/Cerulean-Circle-GmbH/once.ts/dist && tsc --project src/submodules/com/github/ucpComponents/Cerulean-Circle-GmbH/once.ts/tsconfig.json && cp -r src/submodules/com/github/ucpComponents/Cerulean-Circle-GmbH/once.ts/src/* src/submodules/com/github/ucpComponents/Cerulean-Circle-GmbH/once.ts/dist && npm run copy:dist
scripts.dev:onceserver: nodemon --watch src/submodules/com/github/ucpComponents/Cerulean-Circle-GmbH/once.ts/src -e ts,ejs,html --exec npm-run-all build:once start:once copy:dist
scripts.dev:components: nodemon --watch src/submodules --ignore dist -e ts,html,less --exec npm run build:modules
